subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Horford scored 23 points, including a last-second layup, to lead the Hawks as they took a win over the Wizards and a three-games-to-two series lead.
snippet: Horford scored 23 points, including a last-second layup, to lead the Hawks as they took a win over the Wizards and a three-games-to-two series lead.
